entry.title: Atosa CookRite ATFS-40 - 40 lb. Natural Gas Floor Fryer - 102,000 BTU
entry.summary:
Vendor: Atosa
Type: Floor Deep Fryer
Price: 1058.00

The Atosa CookRite ATSF-40 is a natural gas commercial deep fryer with a 40 pound oil capacity. It is made of stainless steel, both interior and exterior, and the tank is welded. It has a high-quality thermostat that maintains the selected temperature between 200°F-400°F.

It comes with two nickel-plated baskets with coated handles to keep them from getting hot. It comes standard with four casters, so you can easily move this fryer around for installation, maintenance, and cleaning.

      • Heavy duty burners with a standing flame and standby pilots
      • Oil cooling zone in the bottom of the tank captures food particles and extends oil life
      • Safety valve with an automatic voltage stabilizing function
      • Self-reset high temperature limiting device
      • Includes two nickel plated baskets with coated handles
      • Wire crumb rack and basket hanger
      • 3/4" NPT rear gas connection and regulator
      • Comes with four casters

SPECS

Supplier Atosa
Brand CookRite
Model ATFS-40
Burners 3
Control Manual
Gas Type Natural Gas
Total BTU 102,000
Basket Dimensions 13.3" x 6.5" x 5.9"
Dimensions 15.6" x 30.1" x 44.4"
Weight 131 lb

entry.title: Frymaster ESG35T - 35 lb. Gas Floor Fryer - 70,000 BTU
entry.summary:
Vendor: Frymaster
Type: Floor Deep Fryer
Price: 2075.00

The Frymaster ESG35T is a 35 lb gas fryer. It has millivolt controls. No electrical connection is required. It has a snap action thermostat and a tube type design, which means the heating elements are fully submersed in the oil. The frypot, door, and sides are stainless steel. The frying area dimensions are 14" x 13.75" x 4.2".

The Frymaster ESG35T is considered a value, high-efficiency fryer. For starters, it exceeds ENERGY STAR® guidelines and qualifies for energy saving rebates. It requires only 70,000 BTU/hr, which is 33% less than comparable models. The submersed heating tubes have proprietary baffles and painted interiors that deliver rapid heat transfer to the oil. And lastly, the fryer has the same cooking capacity as your average 45 lb fryer, which will in turn save you 10 lb of oil every time the frypot is filled.

      • Made in America
      • NSF approved
      • ENERGY STAR certified
      • 35 lb capacity
      • Millivolt control system
      • Snap action thermostat
      • Tube type design
      • Comes with two fry baskets

    SPECS

    Model ESG35T
    Dimensions (WDH) 15.5" x 29.25" x 45"
    Frying Area 14" x 13.75" x 4.2"
    Oil Capacity 35 lb capacity

    WARRANTY 

    One year limited parts and labour warranty.

    DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.title: Frymaster SR114E - 40 lb. Electric Floor Fryer - 14 kW
entry.summary:
Vendor: Frymaster
Type: Floor Deep Fryer
Price: 2798.00 - 3095.00 (4 variants)

The Frymaster SR114E is a 14kW electric fryer with a 40 lb oil capacity. It is suitable for frying a wide variety of basic foods, whether they be fresh or frozen: appetizers, chicken, fries, breaded products, etc.

The Frymaster SR114E is a tube type fryer, which means the heating elements are fully submersed in the oil. This can be harder to clean than some open pot models, but the benefits lie in a faster heat-up time and the ability to perform heavy-duty frying jobs due to a wide cold zone that catches debris from flakier foods.

      • Made in America
      • NSF approved
      • Frying area 13.75" x 13.75" x 5.25"
      • Tube type fryer
      • Comes with two fry baskets
      • Power switch and indicator light

SPECS

Model SR114E
Dimensions (WDH) 15.75" x 27.25" x 44"
Frying Area 13.75" x 13.75" x 5.25"
Oil Capacity 40 lb capacity

WARRANTY 

One year limited parts and labour warranty.

entry.title: Frymaster MJ140 - 40 lb. Gas Floor Fryer - 110,000 BTU
entry.summary:
Vendor: Frymaster
Type: Floor Deep Fryer
Price: 2474.00

The Frymaster MJ140 is a 40 lb gas fryer. It has millivolt controls. No electrical connection is required. It also comes equipped with a Master Jet burner system that creates a large heat transfer area and a snap action thermostat that reliably activates the burner in response to any temperature changes. The frypot, door, and cabinet are stainless steel. The frying area dimensions are 12" x 15" x 4.25".

The Frymaster MJ140 is an open pot fryer, which means it is heated externally. It is easier to clean than a tube type fryer, but due to its smaller cold zone it is more suited for frying less flakey foods. Another similar model to this is the Frymaster GF14, but the main difference is that the heating targets for the GF14 are metal whereas the MJ140 heating targets are ceramic, and just a bit more efficient as a result.

      • Made in America
      • NSF approved
      • 40 lb capacity
      • Millivolt control system
      • Snap action thermostat
      • Open pot design
      • Ceramic heating targets
      • Comes with two fry baskets

    SPECS

    Model MJ140
    Dimensions (WDH) 15.5" x 29.25" x 45"
    Frying Area 12" x 15" x 4.25"
    Oil Capacity 40 lb. capacity

    WARRANTY 

    One year limited parts and labour warranty.

    DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.summary:
Vendor: Frymaster

The Frymaster SR162G is a 75 pound gas fryer. It has millivolt controls. No electrical connection is required. It also comes equipped with a Master Jet burner system that creates a large heat transfer area and a snap action thermostat that reliably activates the burner in response to any temperature changes. The frying area dimensions are 18" x 18" x 3.75".

The Frymaster SR162G is a tube type fryer, which means it has tubes in the frypot that directly heat the oil. It is suitable for heavy-duty frying due to its larger cold zone.

entry.summary:
Vendor: Frymaster
Type: Floor Deep Fryer
Price: 1138.00 - 1547.00 (4 variants)

The Frymaster SR142G is a 43 pound gas fryer. It has millivolt controls. No electrical connection is required. It also comes equipped with a Master Jet burner system that creates a large heat transfer area and a snap action thermostat that reliably activates the burner in response to any temperature changes. The frying area dimensions are 14" x 13.75" x 4.2".

Frymaster fryers are made in America and well-known in the restaurant industry. A model similar to the Frymaster SR142G is the Frymaster GF14. The difference is that the Frymaster SR142G is a tube type fryer and the Frymaster GF14 is an open pot fryer. Tube type fryers are harder to clean, but better suited for heavy-duty frying, than their open pot counterparts.

entry.title: Frymaster GF14 - 40 lb. Gas Floor Fryer - 100,000 BTU
entry.summary:
Vendor: Frymaster
Type: Floor Deep Fryer
Price: 1446.00

The Frymaster GF14 is a 40 pound gas fryer. It has millivolt controls. No electrical connection is required. It also comes equipped with a Master Jet burner system that creates a large heat transfer area and a snap action thermostat that reliably activates the burner in response to any temperature changes. The frying area dimensions are 12" x 15" x 4".

Frymaster fryers are made in America and well-known. Their claim to fame is their open pot design. An open pot fryer is heated externally whereas tube-type fryers have tube burners that directly heat the oil. Open pots are easier to clean but less suited for heavy-duty frying than their tube type counterparts. For a similar item that has a tube-type design, check out the Frymaster SR42G.

The Frymaster GF14 is also similar to the Frymaster MJ140. The main difference is that MJ140 has a ceramic heating target that makes it slightly more efficient than the Frymaster GF14. But rest assured, if you do not need that extra bit of optimization then then GF14 is still a great fryer and is considered to be one of Frymaster's top selling fryers.

      • Made in America
      • NSF approved
      • Open pot design that is easy-to-clean and suitable for less flaky foods
      • Metal heating targets
      • 40 lb capacity
      • Millivolt controls
      • Snap action thermostat
      • Comes with two fry baskets
      • Comes with steel legs and casters

      SPECS

      Model GF14
      Dimensions (WDH) 15.6" x 30.9" x 41.1"
      Frying Area 12" x 15" x 4"
      Oil Capacity 40 lb.
      Power 100,000 Btu/hr.
      Input 25,189 kcal/hr.
      Gas Connection 3/4"

entry.title: Garland ED-15F - 17 lb. Electric Countertop Fryer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Garland
Type: Countertop Deep Fryer
Price: 2048.00 - 2399.00 (4 variants)

Ranges, griddles, broilers, induction -- Garland does it all. They've won awards from both Kitchen Awards®️ and Energy Star®️, being consistently recognized and sought after for their commitment to quality and energy efficiency. All of their equipment is made in Canada, with the exception of induction, which is Swiss-made!

The Garland ED-15F is a countertop electric fryer and a member of Garland's Designer series. It has a 17 lb. tank capacity and 5300 watts of power. There's an option to have it run on 8000 watts of power as a more powerful "Super Fryer." The ED-15F is designed as a standalone fryer or it can be paired with other members of Garland's Designer series.

The front, sides, and removable tank are all made of stainless steel. It's 15 inches wide, comes with a set of twin fryer baskets, and for controls has a simple control nob and heat indicator with an on/off switch. Lastly, it's NSF approved.

      • Made in Canada
      • NSF approved
      • 17 lb. tank capacity
      • Two options: 5300 watts or 8000 watts of power
      • Front, sides, and tank are stainless steel
      • 14" wide
      • Comes with a set of twin fryer baskets

SPECS

Model ED-15F; ED-15SF
Dimensions (WDH) 15" x 24" x 13"
Capacity 5 cubic feet
Electrical 208v or 240v / 60Hz / 1 phase

WARRANTY

One year limited parts and labour warranty.

entry.title: American Range AF-75 - 65-80 lb. Gas Floor Fryer - 160,000 BTU
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Range
Type: Floor Deep Fryer
Price: 3138.00

The American Range AF-75 is a gas-powered professional floor fryer with a 65-80 lb oil capacity. The exterior is all stainless-steel as well as the basket hanger/flue riser. The removeable basket hanger accommodates two large baskets, which are included as well as a basket support screen. Thermostatic controls adjust from 200º to 400ºF (93º-204ºC), and the whole unit sits on 6" chrome-plated adjustable legs.

This fryer has been designed and built in the USA to suit demanding everyday needs and extreme operating periods. The vessel tank design holds a deeper oil level for larger food products. A significant cool zone prevents trapped food particle carbonization while extending oil life, and a front-slanted vessel bottom allows for quick and easy oil draining. 

      • Made in the USA
      • Natural gas or liquid propane
      • Stainless Steel heavy duty construction
      • 160,000 BTU
      • Rugged double layer access door
      • Thermostatic control from 200ºF - 400ºF
      • Millivolt System with 100% safety shut off
      • No electrical power required
      • Removable hanger accommodates two fry baskets

SPECS

Model AF-75
Total BTU 160,000
KW 47
Dimensions (WDH) 19.5" x 34.25" x 45.75"
Cooking Area 18" x 18"
No. of Burners 4
Shipping Weight 198 lb

SHIPPING

entry.summary:

The Omcan CE-CN-0040 is a entry-level electric commercial fryer that doesn't sacrifice quality for its price-point. It is 220v, has a 40 lb oil capacity, and has a stainless steel front, pot, and galvanized sides. The controls are simple -- there's an on/off switch. There's a 14kW flat heating element to promote even heat transfer. This fryer has a deep cold-zone with a forward-sloping bottom, and an oil draining extension.

entry.title: Vollrath FFA8130-C - 30 lb. Countertop Electric Fryer - 208-240v
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vollrath
Type: Countertop Deep Fryer
Price: 1503.00

The Vollrath Cayenne medium duty electric fryer has a 15 lb capacity per well. It is 18.5" from front to back, and 23" from side to side. This fryer features quick heat up and temperature recovery time between loads in order to help you deliver deliciously crisp fried foods to your customers.

The Cayenne electric fryer features 3500 watt elements to provide quick heat-up and temperature recovery time between loads. It is made with a fully-welded oil tank with a safety interlocked drainage valve for easy draining and cleaning. There is also a cold zone that helps keep oil fresh longer.

      • This unit is thermostatically controlled to 374° F (190° C)
      • Features an automatic thermal overload shutoff at 446° F (230° C) for safety
      • "Power On" indicator light
      • Includes two small fryer baskets (40711) and one small night cover (40714) per well. Also sold separately.
      • Optional large baskets and night covers
      • Nickel-plated steel wire baskets feature cool-touch handle
      • Element box assemblies can be removed for easy cleaning and versatility.
      • Internal micro-switch disconnects power when element box is removed
      • Each element box is wired separately and has separate cord with plug
      • Non-skid rubber feet prevent slipping
      • Minimal footprint to accommodate tight counter spaces • 5 ft. (1.5 m) cord with plug

SPECS

Model FFA8130-C
Item Number 40710-C
Dimensions (WDH) 23" x 18.5" x 16"
Food Capacity 15 lbs per well
Watts 2630-3500 per well
Voltage 208-240v
Amps 12.6 -14.6 per well

The Vollrath FFA7020 and FFA8020 Cayenne standard duty electric fryers can be ordered in 120v and 208-240v. It's perfect for French fries, chicken, seafood, and more. The units are 17.27" from front to back and feature quick heat up and temperature recovery time between loads in order to help you deliver deliciously crisp fried foods to your customers.

The Cayenne electric fryer is thermostatically controlled to 375° F (190° C) and features an automatic safety shut off at 390° F (199° C). This fryer was made in a space saving format to accommodate tight counter spaces. It is ideal for small pubs, colleges, and product-specific applications.

entry.title: Imperial IFS-75 - 75 lb. Gas Floor Fryer - 175,000 BTU
entry.summary:
Vendor: Imperial
Type: Floor Deep Fryer
Price: 3710.00 - 4619.00 (4 variants)

The Imperial IFS-75 is a gas-powered floor-model deep fryer that can be ordered with either tube-fired burners or an open pot design (IFS-75-OP), for either natural gas or liquid propane. It has a 75 pound oil capacity.

The open pot design is perfect for a commercial kitchen that will produce a lot of fries, onion rings, chicken tenders, and other pre-breaded items. It is easy to clean, but won't work as well with high-sediment food items as the tube-fired model, and it will take longer to preheat. The tube-fired model will work well with heavily battered, high-sediment food. But cleaning this model type can be a bit more difficult than an open pot design.

Imperial has been making high quality, top value cooking equipment since 1957. They use innovative manufacturing processing with state-of-the-art technology and machinery to enhance efficiencies, lower production costs, and offer top quality equipment.

      • Made in the USA
      • Precision welded frypots: Radius formed edges precision welded robotically on the outside of the frypot for accuracy and consistency. Virtually eliminates leaks
      • Stainless steel exterior, except back
      • Stainless steel frypot
      • Large nickel-plated fry baskets
      • Vinyl-coated basket handle
      • Fine mesh crumb screen
      • Full heat shield behind control panel
      • Double panel door
      • Recessed bottom for drain accessibility
      • 1.25" full port drain valve
      • Full bottom structural support
      • Plate mounted legs

SPECS

Model IFS-75, IFS-75-OP
Oil Capacity 75 lb
Gas Output 175,000 BTU
Ship Weight 270 lb
Manifold Pressure 4" W.C. (NG) | 11" W.C. (LP)
Manifold Size 3/4"
Frying Area 18" x 18"
Dimensions (WDH) 19.5" x 34.5" x 45.75"

WARRANTY

One year parts and labour warranty. Limited warranty on frypot, stainless steel frypot is five years pro-rated.

DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

One year parts and labour warranty. Limited warranty on frypot, stainless steel frypot is five years pro-rated.

entry.title: Imperial IFS-40 - 40 lb. Gas Floor Fryer - 105,000 BTU
entry.summary:
Vendor: Imperial
Type: Floor Deep Fryer
Price: 2006.00 - 2579.00 (4 variants)

The Imperial IFS-40 is a gas-powered floor-model deep fryer that can be ordered with either tube-fired burners or an open pot design (IFS-40-OP), for either natural gas or liquid propane. It has a 40 pound oil capacity.

The open pot design is perfect for a commercial kitchen that will produce a lot of fries, onion rings, chicken tenders, and other pre-breaded items. It is easy to clean, but won't work as well with high-sediment food items as the tube-fired model, and it will take longer to preheat. The tube-fired model will work well with heavily battered, high-sediment food. But cleaning this model type can be a bit more difficult than an open pot design.

Imperial has been making high quality, top value cooking equipment since 1957. They use innovative manufacturing processing with state-of-the-art technology and machinery to enhance efficiencies, lower production costs, and offer top quality equipment.

      • Made in the USA
      • Precision welded frypots: Radius formed edges precision welded robotically on the outside of the frypot for accuracy and consistency. Virtually eliminates leaks
      • Stainless steel exterior, except back
      • Stainless steel frypot
      • Large nickel-plated fry baskets
      • Vinyl-coated basket handle
      • Fine mesh crumb screen
      • Full heat shield behind control panel
      • Double panel door
      • Recessed bottom for drain accessibility
      • 1.25" full port drain valve
      • Full bottom structural support
      • Plate mounted legs

SPECS

Model IFS-40, IFS-40-OP
Oil Capacity 40 lb
Gas Output 105,000 BTU
Ship Weight 221 lb
Manifold Pressure 4" W.C. (NG) | 11" W.C. (LP)
Manifold Size 3/4"
Frying Area 14" x 14"
Dimensions (WDH) 15.5" x 30.5" x 45.75"

WARRANTY

One year parts and labour warranty. Limited warranty on frypot, stainless steel frypot is five years pro-rated.

DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.title: Ikon IGF-75/80 - 75-80 lb. Gas Floor Fryer - 150,000 BTU
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ikon
Type: Floor Deep Fryer
Price: 1307.00

The Ikon IGF-75/80 is a commercial deep fryer with a 75 - 80 lb oil capacity. It has a tube heat exchange that incorporates fast temperature recovery. The fry tanks are stainless steel, and are pressure blasted to give them a smooth finish and make them easy-to-clean. Both the front and door are stainless steel, and the sides are made of galvanized steel. The fryer baskets are made of nickel. It comes with four casters (legs are optional).

For an efficient full drainage the drain valve for this unit is full port and 1-1/4" in diameter. There are four tube burners, each 30,000 BTUs. The thermostat is snap action, and has a range of 200 - 400 degrees Fahrenheit. Last but not least this fryer has a large cold zone that traps food particles.

      • 75 - 80 lb oil capacity
      • Tube heat exchange
      • Pressure blasted, stainless steel fry tanks
      • Galvanized steel walls
      • Nickel fryer baskets
      • Come with four 5" casters. Adjustable stainless steel legs are optional
      • Full port drain valve with 1-1/4" diameter
      • Four tube burners; 30,000 BTUs each
      • Snap action thermostat; 200-400°F
      • Large cold zone 

SPECS

Model IGF-75/80
Dimensions 21" x 34.3" x 39.4" 
Oil Capacity 75-80 lb 
Gas Type Natural/Propane
Heat Tubes 4 
Total BTU 150,000

SHIPPING

Usually ships in 2 - 4 business days.

WARRANTY

One year limited warranty.

entry.title: Royal RFT-50 - 50 lb. Gas Floor Fryer - 114,000 BTU
entry.summary:
Vendor: Royal
Type: Floor Deep Fryer
Price: 1396.00 - 1656.00 (4 variants)

The Royal RFT-50 is a deep fryer with a 50 lb capacity -- perfect for frying up delectable, deep fried goodness to your customers. Both its front and sides are constructed of stainless steel, and it comes with twin fry baskets with plastic coated handles for easy handling.

The frying area for this Royal RFT-50 deep fryer is 14" x 14", and its cast iron burners have a total of 114,000 BTU. Additionally, its temperature range can be adjusted anywhere from 93 - 204 degrees Celsius. This fryer also has a millivolt control system with a 100% shut off, and 6" high adjustable heavy duty legs.

Last but not least, this fryer is American-made!

      • Temperature range of 93 - 204 degrees Celsius
      • Frying capacity of 14" x 14"
      • 114,000 BTU
      • Constructed of stainless steel
      • 50 lb capacity
      • Twin fry baskets with plastic coated handles
      • Millivolt system with 100% safety shut-off
      • 6" high adjustable heavy duty legs
      • Made in America! Built with quality construction and parts

entry.title: Vulcan ER - Electric Floor Fryer - Energy Star Certified
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vulcan
Type: Floor Deep Fryer
Price: 6990.00 - 45380.00 (54 variants)

Vulcan's ER series of free standing electric deep fryers can be ordered in a number of different sizes and with varying control types. You can order either a 50 or 85 pound tank, and you can order these fryers with 1 to 4 tanks.

They're available in three different control types: solid state analog knob, solid state digital, or programmable computer. Most of these fryers come with Vulcan's built-in "KleenScreen Plus" filtration system, but you can also order the 1 tank model without this feature.

The ER fryers are Energy Star certified and will deliver virtually up to 85% (or more) cooking efficiency with ribbon-style heating elements that have more surface area than conventional elements. And because these fryers add less heat to the kitchen, operators will save on air conditioning cost and still maintain a comfortable working environment.

      • Stainless steel cabinet and fry tank
      • Tank Brush, clean-out rod and drain extension
      • 17 kW elements on 50 lb. models and 24kW elements on 85 lb. models
      • Energy Star certified
      • Available with KleenScreen PLUS Filtration System

SPECS

Model Tanks Total Capacity Specs
1ER50/A/D/C 1 50 lb (no built-in filtration) PDF
1ER85/A/D/C 1 85 lb (no built-in filtration) PDF
1ER50/AF/DF/CF 1 50 lb PDF
1ER85/AF/DF/CF 1 85 lb PDF
2ER50/AF/DF/CF 2 100 lb PDF
2ER85/AF/DF/CF 2 170 lb PDF
3ER50/AF/DF/CF 3 150 lb PDF
3ER85/AF/DF/CF 3 255 lb PDF
4ER50/AF/DF/CF 4 200 lb PDF

CONTROL TYPES


Analog
Behind the Door

  • Accurate temperature knob control: 200 – 390° Fahrenheit
  • Fast recovery: reacts within 2° Fahrenheit of set temperature
  • 2 melt modes: Liquid and Solid
  • Easy-to-use KleenScreen PLUS Filtration System


Digital

  • Accurate temperature digital control: 200 – 390° Fahrenheit
  • Fast recovery: reacts within 2° Fahrenheit of set temperature
  • 3 melt modes: Liquid, Solid and No Melt
  • Easy-to-use KleenScreen PLUS Filtration System
  • Compensating time adjusts for load capacity
  • 2 countdown timers
  • Automatic temperature controlled boil out
  • Basket lift compatible


Computer

  • Accurate temperature digital control: 200 – 390° Fahrenheit
  • Fast recovery: reacts within 2° Fahrenheit of set temperature
  • 3 melt modes: Liquid, Solid and No Melt
  • Easy-to-use KleenScreen PLUS Filtration System
  • Compensating time adjusts for load capacity
  • 10 different menu items can be programmed with product names
  • Automatic temperature controlled boil out
  • Easy to program through USB interface (laptop or desktop) or through touchpad
  • Large screens clearly display menu items
  • Secondary programming: Shake Time and Hold Time
  • Basket lift compatible

WARRANTY

One year limited parts and labour warranty. Ten year limited fry tank warranty.

FREE SHIPPING

*This item has free shipping in Canada! Now, some conditions may apply, so please see our shipping policies or contact us for more information.

For instance, even though an item has free shipping, if it weighs over 75 pounds, you may be charged a tailgate fee (unless you have a forklift or a loading dock). Or if you live in a rural or island location, there may be some charges. Otherwise, this item ships free all across Canada!

entry.title: Southbend SB65S - 65-80 lb. Gas Floor Fryer - 150,000 BTU
entry.summary:
Vendor: Southbend
Type: Floor Deep Fryer
Price: 2132.00

The Southbend SB65S comes from one of the top manufacturers of commercial cooking equipment. This commercial deep fryer has a 65 to 80-pound oil capacity, with a stainless steel pot. The tube-style pot allows more efficient heat distribution. And wide spacing between the tubes allows for easy cleaning.

This fryer comes standard with two twin-plated, wire-mesh fry baskets with plastic-coated handles; one plated tube rack; one drain extension; a removable basket hanger; and 6" adjustable legs.

      • Welded stainless steel tank with an extra smooth peened finish to ensure easy cleaning.
      • Stainless steel cabinet door and front panel.
      • Galvanized sides and back
      • Tube-type fry pot permits over 50% more heat to be transferred to the fat.
      • Quick recovery is provided to eliminate waiting between loads.
      • Large cold zone captures food particles, reduces flavor transfer, and extends oil life.
      • Wide spacing between tubes - permits easy access for cleaning.
      • 1.25" full port, front drain valve - allows for quick draining.
      • Single unit combination gas shutoff valve, pressure regulator, and pilot system.
      • 100% safety shutoff.
      • 3/4" rear gas connection.

    SPECS

    Model SB65S
    Number of Burners 5
    BTU 150,000
    Oil Capacity 65-80 pounds
    Cooking Area 18" x 18"
    Cooking Depth 5"
    Electrical N/A
    Dimensions (WDH) 20.1" x 34.4" x 46.1"

    WARRANTY

    One year parts & labour warranty. Additional fry tank warranty: if the fry tank has leaked because of a manufacturing defect within the first two years of operation, the fryer will be replaced.

    DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET
